metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5428 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2019-11358. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2019-11358. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2019-11358 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: jquery: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
